title: Silver/Gold Duo Bot Lane LF Ranked Team
body:
Hi everyone

TsunaYokai and I (Jarthur121) are two 22 year olds that have been playing in the bot lane together for approximately a year now, we have great synergy in lane and we rarely if ever lose our lane. We are consistent, easy to communicate with and generally just awesome guys who want to play in a ranked team that wants to climb elo and have fun.  I work fulltime so I am only available at night after 6pm AEST however Tsuna has a much more flexible schedule to work with.  Our top three champs our roles are:

Jarthur - Caitlyn, Jinx, Corki/or Ez
Tsuna - Nami, Thresh, Janna (really Tsuna can play anything as a support)


If you think we might be the bot lane you are looking for please hit me (Jarthur121) up with an add on LoL and we'll go from there.

See you on the rift!

Jarthur And Tsuna

replies.body: I sent you a request currently have an inactive team that's silver looking to get it going again if you guys wanna duo bot
Yeah man I'd be keen to check it out at least, when suits you?
